import React from'react';import'./ImageGrid.css';// Generate deterministic image results using Picsum
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const generateImageResults=function(query){let count=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:12;const results=[];const seed=query.split('').reduce((acc,char)=>acc+char.charCodeAt(0),0);for(let i=0;i<count;i++){const imageId=(seed+i*17)%1000+1;const width=300+i%3*50;const height=200+i%4*30;results.push({id:"img-".concat(i,"-").concat(seed),url:"https://picsum.photos/seed/".concat(query.replace(/\s/g,''),"-").concat(i,"/").concat(width,"/").concat(height),thumbnail:"https://picsum.photos/seed/".concat(query.replace(/\s/g,''),"-").concat(i,"/300/200"),title:"".concat(query," - Image ").concat(i+1),source:'picsum.photos',width,height});}return results;};const ImageGrid=_ref=>{let{query,onImageClick}=_ref;const images=generateImageResults(query,15);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-grid",role:"region","aria-label":"Image results",children:images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-item",onClick:()=>onImageClick===null||onImageClick===void 0?void 0:onImageClick(image),role:"button",tabIndex:0,"aria-label":image.title,onKeyPress:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&(onImageClick===null||onImageClick===void 0?void 0:onImageClick(image)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image.thumbnail,alt:image.title,loading:"lazy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"image-source",children:image.source}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"image-title",children:image.title})]})]},image.id))});};export default ImageGrid;
